examples.example: 我们分成了一组去完成这项有趣的任务。

translate.english: We were divided into a group to complete this interesting task.

examples.example: 我们这一组同学齐心协力，出色地完成了老师布置的任务。

translate.english: The classmates in our group worked together with one heart and one mind and accomplished the task assigned by the teacher excellently.

examples.example: 我们一组人团结协作，共同打造了一个美好的社区环境。

translate.english: Our group of people united and cooperated to jointly create a beautiful community environment.
